name: MoonLoose - EarthBound parody game
description:
It is Tinkle's first day of Kindergarten and she is very excited to go to her new school. However, she will soon find out that this is no normal first day of Kindergarten and that there is an abstract, evil presence looming over the seemingly-peaceful town of SnailLand...

Controls: Arrow Keys, Space Bar, and Left Shift

This is a game I made for fun in Unity 2D in about five months. I'm new to the engine so excuse the lack of polish and simplicity. This is inspired by my favorite game, EarthBound. There is some dark edgy edgelord humor so sorry for that. Let me know what you think!
